experiences.description:
Produced study materials in a variety of academic subjects to 
help senior students improve their design portfolio.
experiences.title: Part-time Tutor

experiences.description:
Contributed articles on a variety of topics related to design to 
Zuibishe learning platform, including experience sharing, 
analysis of professional lecture and giving recommendations.
experiences.title: Freelance Writer

experiences.description:
Full Bleed: A Journal of Art & Design Journal published by MICA, 
designed and edited by students. 
Film Branding project, collaborated with film major MFA 
students. Worked on the design of visual identity including 
posters, EPK and website design.
experiences.title: Freelance Designer

experiences.description:
Assisted professor Maureen Weiss  in sophomore Graphic Design 
Studio I and Typography I. Participated in critiques for juniors.
experiences.title: Graduate Teaching Intern

experiences.description:
Provided assistance to senior designers. Formulated design 
concepts and artwork for promotional materials. Worked on 
the development and implementation of creative requirements, 
including layout, illustration, typography and photography.
experiences.title: Design Intern

experiences.description:
Created a branding image with a theme of “Solitude”. Included 
an expanded concept, design for a logo and visual identity. 
Organized and assigned tasks to each member for completion 
of their work.
experiences.title: Design Project Group Leader

experiences.description:
Designed a specific visual identity for the American 
Express Centurion Card, including the typography, packaging, 
and the display of the card.
experiences.title: Freelance Designer
